text: Jack Jack Dongarra ForMemRS; (born July 18, 1950) is an American academic and computer scientist. He is the University Distinguished Professor of Computer Science at the University of Tennessee. He was a faculty fellow at Texas A&M; University's institute for advanced study (2014â€“2018). Dongarra is the founding director of Innovative Computing Laboratory. In 2022, he won a Turing Award. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:American computer scientists Category:Academics from Texas Category:Academics from Tennessee Category:Turing Award winners Category:Scientists from Chicago
title: Jack Dongarra
